works.description:
Bio of the singer Parmeggiani
The plagiarist has warned me via email that he copy my site
on his blog.  He is also  re-posting what Google
  takes off. I have emailed Blogger every time he does it.  He is
a repeat offender.

Example of repeated plagiarism
==============
Hello Francois,

Thanks for reaching out to us.

In accordance with the DMCA, we have completed processing your
infringement complaint and the content in question no longer appears on
the following URL:
